text: Naresh Chandra (1 August 1934 â€“ 9 July 2017) was an Indian politician. He was born in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India. He served as the 20th Cabinet Secretary of India from 1990 through 1992, the 13th Governor of Gujarat from 1995 through 1996 and as the 19th Indian Ambassador to the United States from 1996 through 2001. Chandra was awarded India's second highest civil awards, the Padma Vibhushan, for his service in 2007. Chandra died at a hospital in Panaji, Goa, India of multiple organ failure on 9 July 2017 at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Executive Profile Category:1934 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Disease-related deaths in India Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Governors of Gujarat Category:Ambassadors of India to the United States
title: Naresh Chandra
